snippet.title: Alt-Frequencies - Audio Teaser
snippet.description:
Stay tuned.

📻 http://altfrequencies.com 📻

Alt-Frequencies is an audio-based narrative mystery game taking
place between multiple radio stations.

This new game stays faithful to the spirit of A Normal Lost Phone
& Another Lost Phone: Laura’s Story, the two games that our studio
has released in 2017: Alt-Frequencies is also based on real world
situations and daily interactions, and aims at raising awareness about
a social issue, namely our relationship with mainstream media and
the treatment of information.

**********

"Alt-Frequencies" (http://altfrequencies.com) by Accidental Queens (http://www.accidentalqueens.com) & Arte France (http://www.arte.tv)

Published by Plug in Digital (http://www.plug-in-digital.com/)

Sound design by Christopher Knight (http://christopherknight.audio/)

2019 © Accidental Queens & Arte France - All rights reserved
